mapper.sql: DataId, DecodeTime, DeviceName, DevEui, GatewayId, GatewayName, Voltage, EquipmentType, MeterNo, UserCode, CurrentColdNumber, CurrentHeatNumber, OriginCurrentHeatNumber, HeatPower, FlowRate, TotalFlow, SupplyWaterTemperature, ReturnWaterTemperature, CurrentTime, Wdc, Status1, Status2, RegFlag, Unit

SELECT * FROM HM_NormalDecodeData hm, ( SELECT MeterNo, MAX( CurrentTime ) AS CurrentTime FROM HM_NormalDecodeData GROUP BY MeterNo ) maxTime WHERE hm.CurrentTime = maxTime.CurrentTime AND hm.MeterNo = maxTime.MeterNo
mapper.insert: insert into HM_NormalDecodeData (DataId, DecodeTime, DeviceName, DevEui, GatewayId, GatewayName, Voltage, EquipmentType, MeterNo, UserCode, CurrentColdNumber, CurrentHeatNumber, OriginCurrentHeatNumber, HeatPower, FlowRate, TotalFlow, SupplyWaterTemperature, ReturnWaterTemperature, CurrentTime, Wdc, Status1, Status2, RegFlag, Unit ) values (#{dataid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{decodetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deveui,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gatewayid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gatewayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voltage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meterno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentcoldnumber,jdbcType=REAL}, #{currentheatnumber,jdbcType=REAL}, #{origincurrentheatnumber,jdbcType=REAL}, #{heatpower,jdbcType=REAL}, #{flowrate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{totalflow,jdbcType=REAL}, #{supplywatertemperature,jdbcType=REAL}, #{returnwatertemperature,jdbcType=REAL}, #{currenttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdc,jdbcType=REAL}, #{status1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update HM_NormalDecodeData
DeviceName = #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DevEui = #{deveui,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GatewayId = #{gatewayid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GatewayName = #{gatewayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Voltage = #{voltage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EquipmentType = #{equipmenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MeterNo = #{meterno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserCode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CurrentColdNumber = #{currentcoldnumber,jdbcType=REAL},
CurrentHeatNumber = #{currentheatnumber,jdbcType=REAL},
OriginCurrentHeatNumber = #{origincurrentheatnumber,jdbcType=REAL},
HeatPower = #{heatpower,jdbcType=REAL},
FlowRate = #{flowrate,jdbcType=REAL},
TotalFlow = #{totalflow,jdbcType=REAL},
SupplyWaterTemperature = #{supplywatertemperature,jdbcType=REAL},
ReturnWaterTemperature = #{returnwatertemperature,jdbcType=REAL},
CurrentTime = #{currenttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Wdc = #{wdc,jdbcType=REAL},
Status1 = #{status1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status2 = #{status2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RegFlag = #{regflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DataId = #{dataid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DecodeTime = #{decodetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update HM_NormalDecodeData set DeviceName = #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DevEui = #{deveui,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GatewayId = #{gatewayid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GatewayName = #{gatewayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Voltage = #{voltage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EquipmentType = #{equipmenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MeterNo = #{meterno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserCode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CurrentColdNumber = #{currentcoldnumber,jdbcType=REAL}, CurrentHeatNumber = #{currentheatnumber,jdbcType=REAL}, OriginCurrentHeatNumber = #{origincurrentheatnumber,jdbcType=REAL}, HeatPower = #{heatpower,jdbcType=REAL}, FlowRate = #{flowrate,jdbcType=REAL}, TotalFlow = #{totalflow,jdbcType=REAL}, SupplyWaterTemperature = #{supplywatertemperature,jdbcType=REAL}, ReturnWaterTemperature = #{returnwatertemperature,jdbcType=REAL}, CurrentTime = #{currenttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Wdc = #{wdc,jdbcType=REAL}, Status1 = #{status1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status2 = #{status2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RegFlag = #{regflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DataId = #{dataid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DecodeTime = #{decodetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
